permissions: User must be authorized to delete the stop via the related transport order; access is delegated through TransportOrderStopPolicy to the associated transport order.
side_effects: Deletes the transport order stop and its dependent stop materials, plan stop links, and transport references; enqueues a direct-distance refresh for the related transport order.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (transport order stop ID) and --confirm must be provided and true.
